editorialNotes.standard: It’s no wonder this charming game became an Internet sensation. Cute cats always help, but when you consider the Pokémon-style collection, Neko Atsume’s popularity seems almost inevitable. Simplicity is another part of its secret—you just set out treats and toys in your yard, then check back later to see which kitties have shown up to enjoy them. You can snap photos to share with friends and discuss exactly how to tempt all 48 felines into making an appearance. We quickly got in the habit of puttering around our yard for a few minutes every couple hours…but it’s not like we’re obsessed or anything. Honest.
